name: Text Regex K
content:
Welcome to RegExr v2.0 by gskinner.com!

"Hello wie geht es dir" Edit the Expression & Text to see matches. Roll over matches or the expression for details. Undo mistakes with ctrl-z. Save & Share expressions with friends or the Community. A full Reference & Help is available in the Library, or watch the video Tutorial. Hallo "Test das ist ein wunder voller super bombastischer fenomenaler super toller ausgezeichneter cooler Test" ja.

Sample text for testing:
abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ
0123456789 +-.,!@#$%^&*();\/|<>"'
12345 -98.7 3.141 .6180 9,000 +42
555.123.4567	+1-(800)-555-2468
foo@demo.net	bar.ba@test.co.uk
www.demo.com	http://foo.co.uk/
http://regexr.com/foo.html?q=bar
